Co.Design (blog) Samsung Wants To Turn Augmented Reality Into The OS Of Your Life 
Co.Design (blog) 
Google Glass and the Apple Watch have both flopped for the same two reasons. First, neither is very attractive. Second, neither proved as essential as the phone that's already in your pocket. But a new concept called Monitorless, developed by Samsung's …
